lines.text: Suppose I pick you up and we'll do something gay?
[Mary catches Paula in another instance of back-stabbing]
['Butch' Hendricks becomes a physical fitness nut when she learns her mother had been in the Olympics]
What would you do if your mother had been a bearded lady?
No one thought more of Paula than I did, and I hated her.
[Walter has spilled as much food as he's eaten]
That was certainly a good meal.
Yeah, and on you it looks good.
Do you think I'll ever have an athlete's arm?
Why don't you settle for athlete's foot?
[Passing Roberta has she closes her over-stuffed suitcase by sitting on it]
